TopicTitle: Storch [Stork] Program - My take on a JNSQ based sandbox exploration of Duna

Articles.Content:
First off 

English is not my mother's tongue expect some errors.

The Storch program is my attempt at exploring Duna on a bigger scale system.

I will be documenting my progress here. 

 

There will be multiple chapters I haven´t thought about all of them yet.

Chapter one : The past unkerbeled exploration of duna

Chapter two : The kerbal efforts of getting to duna.

Chapter three : What lies beyond.

Chapter four - ∞ ???

So this was the introduction lets get started 

 

 

Edited July 9, 2020 by SirBlob

Chapter 1.1 : Relay satellites for football

Year 1970 Launched Duna missions 0 

"We crashed or third satelie this week because we lost contact" sayed Wernher von Kerman, 

"Yep Jebediah is using all our satellite power for his damm football connection" Gene Kerman responded angrily ,

Jebediah steps into the room "Maybe if we had more DNS power we could controll our satellites and watch footbal without  losing signal" he said while handling some firecrackers. 

"You are right " mumbled Gene Kerman "Why haven´t we thought about this earlier?" 

"And I already have the right blueprint for our situation" Werner von Kerman responded while putting the blueprints on the table quickly. "Take a look at this our new Kingfisher Booster!"

"This will be enough DSN for Jebiah and our satelites combinded" Werner von Kerman expressed excited

"Why do we have blueprints of such a rocket and haven´t launched one yet?" Gene Kerman asked 

"Well we  had ONE but someone left firecrackes in one of the fuel tanks and it exploded" Werner von Kerman responded while glancing at Jebediah 

"Well build another one" Gene Kerman responded 

The next month 

3.....

2.....

1..... 

IGNITION WE HAVE LIFTOFF OF KINGFISH 1

90 seconds after liftoff solid rocket boosters are seperated evrything according to plan 

1 Stage has run out of fuel 2 Stage Ignition 

2 Stage will be burning for an AP of ~8968km for an geostationary orbit, then the PE will be raised to ~3961km, first satelite will be deployed one orbit later.

All 3 satelites deployed accordingly, now we have 3 satelites for controlling our other satelites and enough power for football

"Well the mission was a complete success I thing everybody will be happy" Gene Kerman expressed

From the other room of the KSC you can hear somebody scream "TOUCHDOWN YEEEESSSSSS!!!!"
